name: Clumsy Robot Testing Lab
description:
This game is a tribute to Abe's Exodus. Control a clunky warrior robot prototype through six testing rooms, blasting all dummy robots with your rocket launcher, your pewpew gun and your railgun. Try to improve your SCORE by completing the level faster and by increasing your STYLE. 

Done with my friend Orféo Roussel.

Unfortunately we cannot build it as HTML5 for reasons we cannot comprehend
